import React from "react" import Card from "../components/card" import FormGroup from "../components/form-group" import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import UsuarioService from "../app/service/usuarioService" class CadastroUsuario extends React.Component{ state = { nome : '', email : '', senha : '', senhaReticao : '' } constructor(){ super() this.service = new UsuarioService(); } cadastrar = () => { console.log(this.state) } cancelar = () => { //this.props.history.push('/login') const usuario = { nome: this.state.nome, email: this.state.email, senha: this.state.senha } this.service.salvar(usuario) } render(){ return (
this.setState({nome: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({email: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({senha: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({senhaReticao: e.target.value}) } />
) } } export default withRouter(CadastroUsuario)
